name: The heartwarming simulation game--Showa Candy Shop
name_original: The heartwarming simulation game--Showa Candy Shop
description:
Memories with Grandma at the Candy Shop will come back!
Follow the story with letters as you run a Candy Shop by tapping.

Fill up your collection catalog with vintage Japanese sweets and toys! …and customers!!
“Model planes”, “soda mocha”, “whistle candy”, and more!!
Each one will bring back nostalgic Japanese memories.


The story progresses bit by bit as you advance through the game.
An emotional tale gradually unfolds, but who can say how it will end!?
The game can be played through to the end entirely for free.
Have fun playing everyday for just a little bit at a time.
Hopefully, it will be a source of joy and warmth in your otherwise hectic day.
◆Story◆
--------------------
At a little Japanese country town in the Showa period, there lies a certain side street straight out of memory lane.
The light of the setting sun is cast brilliantly across the red iron roofs.
A kind old lady, though scary when angered, runs a small store all by herself.
This is the tale of her little candy shop at the street corner.
Our strange yet heartwarming story begins here--a shop whose memory is kept like a gem in a jewel box.
It is the time of radio calisthenics, shaved ice, water balloons, and singing cicadas.
A perfect day during the summer vacation that always seemed to be without end...

--------------------
How to Play
◆Goal◆
-Take all the money from those brats…. I mean, receive all the money you can from visiting kids to build up your store! :)

-Complete the catalog by unlocking every nostalgic items available!


-Receive all the letters to see what happens at the end!!

◆Game Flow◆
1. Use Stock to increase your shop's goods
2. A bunch of kid customers will come to your shop with their allowance money in hand.
3. Swipe over kids to collect their money.
4. Level up your Sweets and Toys once you have collected enough money.
5. Unlock new items in the catalog by leveling up your store.
Earning money will get easier as you earn more money by repeating the steps above. (1~4)
Keep doing this to see if you can fill up the catalog and reach the conclusion of the story!

◆Stock◆
Stocking gradually fills your shop with items that will bring in the kids.
Kids will stop coming to the shop as time goes by, so be sure to check in periodically to stock up the toys and sweets.

Keep the following points in mind!
◎◎◎The amount of items you stocked can be chosen from amongst the 5 levels.◎◎◎

◎◎◎Depending on the amount of Toys and Sweets selected, it will take between 15 minutes to 8 hours to complete stocking.◎◎◎


◎◎◎Purchasing many of items at once will keep your shop running for a long time. But this also depends on the number of kids coming to buy the sweets and toys. ◎◎◎

◎◎◎Purchasing only few items will let the kids be able visit the shop easily so the sweets and toys will sell quickly.◎◎◎

You can build up your store efficiently just by doing a little stocking during your lunch break, or putting in a big stock right before you go to bed!
